de.weltraumschaf.jvfs

Class JvfsTemporaryPathRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
      • de.weltraumschaf.jvfs.JvfsTemporaryPathRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public class JvfsTemporaryPathRule
extends org.junit.rules.ExternalResource
    The TemporaryFolder Rule allows creation of files and folders that are guaranteed to be deleted when the test method finishes (whether it passes or fails): 
     public static class HasTempFolder {
      @Rule
      public JvfsTemporaryPathRule folder= new JvfsTemporaryPathRule();

      @Test
      public void testUsingTempFolder() throws IOException {
          final Path createdFile= folder.newFile("myfile.txt");
          final Path createdFolder= folder.newFolder("subfolder");
          // ...
      }
 }
    Inspired by org.junit.rules.TemporaryFolder from JUnit. This class enhances the original in that way that it uses Java 7 NIO API instead of the old file API.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
